attributes.action: Make more parking and safer crossing for our children's school!!
attributes.background: St Clements primary school in leysdown does not have enough parking for the parents to be able to collect there children and then on top it has a dangerous road out the front with no proper crossing!!! This causes parents to be late to collect there young children& even get parking fines!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
